javadoc: The FunctionThunkFieldLocation class provides specific information about the Function Thunk field within a program location.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: locationAddr
params.comment: the address of the listing location (i.e., referent code unit)

params.name: charOffset
params.comment: the position within the function thunk string for this location.

params.name: signature
params.comment: the function signature string at this location.
